ai-tika-s0303t3:2_0: It’s not due to pass away, guilt, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_1: This is the right way to look at you, profound, transcendent, and the noble path.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_2: He proclaims what is contrary to the Teaching as the Monastic Law.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_3: That’s why I fly away and flee.’
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_4: to share my brothers with a vessel.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_5: Because they don’t burn up, burn and burn down.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_6: Standing, it is allowable and unallowable,
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_7: Remember the truth of truth, the vision of the truth, and the Truth of seeing.
ai-tika-s0303t3:2_8: They suffered, and they need to ask for the reason.
ai-tika-s0303t3:4_0: The Linked Discourses on arrival are finished.
